headline: AppLovin (APP) Rebrands Ad Platform as Axon, Launches Axon Ads Manager
summary: AppLovin Corporation (NASDAQ:APP) is one of the best performing NASDAQ stocks according to hedge funds. On October 1, the company rebranded its customer-facing advertising platform as Axon. It launched Axon Ads Manager, a self-service ad management tool, which is initially available on a referral-only basis. Axon is powered by an AI engine that uses predictive […]
